quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
A great thing can only be done by a great person; and they do it without effort.
A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
About the only thing that comes to us without effort is old age.
Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
A great thing can only be done by a great person; and they do it without effort.
A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
About the only thing that comes to us without effort is old age.
Civilization is nothing more than the effort to reduce the use of force to the last resort.
Concentrating on the essentials. We will then be accomplishing the greatest possible results with the effort expended.
Continuous, unflagging effort, persistence and determination will win. Let not the man be discouraged who has these.
Education comes from within; you get it by struggle and effort and thought.
Effort and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
Effort is only effort when it begins to hurt.
Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
Everyone makes a greater effort to hurt other people than to help himself.
Evil is done without effort, naturally, it is the working of fate; good is always the product of an art.
For every disciplined effort there is a multiple reward.
Freedom from effort in the present merely means that there has been effort stored up in the past.
Great art is never produced for its own sake. It is too difficult to be worth the effort.
Great effort springs naturally from a great attitude.
Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
If one is to be called a liar, one may as well make an effort to deserve the name.
Inscribe all human effort with one word, artistry's haunting curse, the Incomplete!
It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed. In this life we get nothing save by effort.
It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
It's the constant and determined effort that breaks down all resistance, sweeps away all obstacles.
Language is an archeological vehicle... the language we speak is a whole palimpsest of human effort and history.
Little by little, through patience and repeated effort, the mind will become stilled in the Self.
Living never wore one out so much as the effort not to live.
Metaphysics means nothing but an unusually obstinate effort to think clearly.
Most of one's life is one prolonged effort to prevent oneself thinking.
Much effort, much prosperity.
No evil dooms us hopelessly except the evil we love, and desire to continue in, and make no effort to escape from.
No great intellectual thing was ever done by great effort.
Our emotions are only ''incidents in the effort to keep day and night together.
Our photographs are filthier and our stories are more disgusting. We make no effort to be artistic.
Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle...
Success is dependent on effort.
The abominable effort to take one's sins with one to paradise.
The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
The effort of art is to keep what is interesting in existence, to recreate it in the eternal.
The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting above average effort.
The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win.
The mode in which the inevitable comes to pass is through effort.
The one thing that matters is the effort.
The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.
The whole effort of a sincere man is to erect his personal impressions into laws.
Theology is the effort to explain the unknowable in terms of the not worth knowing.
To have striven, to have made the effort, to have been true to certain ideals - this alone is worth the struggle.
To talk without effort is, after all, the great charm of talking.
What is written without effort is in general read without pleasure.
When something can be read without effort, great effort has gone into its writing.
Winning is not everything, but the effort to win is.
